messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2237.regarding Ned
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/13/2002 7:27:53 AM Central Daylight Time, ... I am still shaking my head...... Ned, I would hate to see you go.......If I didn t like what
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/13/2002 7:27:53 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Ned can't keep his obnoxious barbs to himself, there will be
> nothing.
> No one to answer questions, no one to help people look at their life in an
> unschooling context, no one who cares.
> It's time for Ned to go.
>

I am still shaking my head......
Ned, I would hate to see you go.......If I didn't like what you said, and I
wanted to tell you in a way that it was said above,I would tell you
personally. Honestly, I would not even respond and would have just deleted
it. It would have just wasted my time and energy.
Ned, you have changed my life in a way that I was getting comfortable about
certain things and I needed a jolt back.
Now they have pass the legislation about medical records no longer need you
permission to share and view your medical records......which will cause me to
get more private. So, I wonder how many people will be taking a look.....They
are already using you grocery store cards against you....
I guy had slipped on the floor and they was able to obtain his store card
info (cause when you sign up with some of them, your have to use your SS#)
and saw that bought alcohol. Well, the case was dropped because of that.
Now they are looking at purchases like who buys mid eastern products.....
I don't take being invaded like that very well.......
There was a question on a registration for an eye exam. It ask if you had any
sexual diseases... ( looked crazed for a moment....they ask this of a 6 year
old....)
I am just wondering.....how many computers will that go into and who is
peaking.....

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
